Verses: 1 thariyu Arasaanda Irandaam Varusham Ettaam Maadhaththile Iththovin Maganaana Peragiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaavukku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vaarththai:

3 aagaiyaal Nee Avargalai Nokki: Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Ennidaththil Thirumbungal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; Appozhudhu Naan Ungalidaththukkuth Thirumbuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

4 ungal Pidhaakkalaip Poliraadheyungal; Mundhina Theerkkadharisigal Avargalai Nokki: Ungal Pollaadha Vazhigalaiyum Ungal Pollaadha Kiriyaigalaiyum Vittuth Thirumbungal Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Kooppittaargal; Aanaalum Enakku Sevikodaamalum Ennai Gavaniyaamalum Ponaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
5 ungal Pidhaakkal Enge? Theerkkadharisigal Endrendraikkum Uyirodiruppaargalo?

6 iraamarponaalum, Theerkkadharisigalaagiya En Oozhiyakkaararukku Naan Kattalaiyitta En Vaarththaigalum En Theermaanangalum Ungal Pidhaakkalidaththil Palikkavillaiyo? Engal Vazhigalinpadiyeyum, Engal Kiriyaigalinpadiyeyum Senaigalin Karththar Engalukku Seyya Nirnayiththapadiye Engalukku Seydhaarendru Avargal Thirumbavandhu Sonnadhillaiyo Endru Sol Endraar.

7 thariyu Arasaanda Irandaam Varusham, Sebaadh Maadhamaagiya Padhinoraam Maadham Irubaththunaalaanthedhiyile, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Iththovin Maganaana Peragiyaavin Kumaaran Sagariyaa Ennum Theerkkadharisikku Undaayitru; Avan Sonnadhu:

8 idho, Indru Raaththiri Sivappuk Kudhiraiyinmel Eriyirundha Oru Purushanaik Kanden; Avar Pallaththaakkil Irukkira Mirudhuchchedigalukkulle Nindraar; Avarukkup Pinnaale Sivappum Mangina Niramum Venmaiyumaana Kudhiraigal Irundhana.
9 appozhudhu Naan; En Aandavare, Ivargal Yaarendru Ketten; Ennode Pesugira Thoodhanaanavar: Ivargal Yaarendru Naan Unakkuk Kaanbippen Endru Sonnaar.
